title.rendered: Charity Football Tournament in support of Mission Education

content.rendered:
Employees from leading corporate in Bengaluru came together for a one of its kind initiative â€“ The Elegant Charity Football Tournament, at XLR8 Indoor Arena, to ensure education of underprivileged children under Smile Foundationâ€™s Mission Education programme.

Highly enthusiastic and strongly committed to the cause, employees from Elegant Properties, Adobe, Euromonitor Research & Consulting Pvt Ltd, Cerner Healthcare, Thomson Reuters, Herbalife, Target, Citrix, Informatica, TUV Reihnland, Globe Moving & Storage Co, JMR Infotech, Schneider Electric, Rubric PR and Bet On India, participated in the tournament. Thomson Reuters won the tournament; making the coveted cup theirs and Bet on India were the Runner Ups for the tournament.

The Charity Football Tournament became a success with the support of our partners â€“ Elegant Properties, Herbalife and GiftXOXO.
